thread.title: Lena's next deals with issues of teenagers
thread.title_full: Lena's next deals with issues of teenagers - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Lena's next deals with issues of teenagers
text:
Lena's upcoming movie Thank You Very Much will deal with issues that pampered youngsters face in the current society.
The film, directed by Sajinlal, is shot in Delhi and Trivandrum and will have Lena playing a prominent character. The movie will tell the tale of a teenage boy, the issues he faces once he is away from the security of his home and how he solves it.
The story also has Babu Namboothiri in supporting role.
Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
